clues: Micaela and her husband were merchant
In 1781 she led the rebellion for independence with her husband
Micaela organized soldiers, weapons, and food
Everyone had to obey the Spanish king
She gave good advice to Tupac Amaru II but he did not listen
Her father was afroperuano and her mother was indigenous
She was killed with her son in the main square in Cusco
She used spies to find out important secrets
